htmlContent:
Degrade DEFCON one level. US gains 2 VP.

If South Korea is US Controlled, then the US may place Influence or attempt Realignments as if they played a 4 Ops card.
name: Soviets Shoot Down KAL-007*
plainContent:
Degrade DEFCON one level. US gains 2 VP.
If South Korea is US Controlled, then the US may place Influence or attempt Realignments as if they played a 4 Ops card.
